entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
